A place between the books

A collection of some items that have found a home on my bookshelf and in my mind.

Find out more

A place to start.

The literary canon has long been considered the pinnacle of a well-rounded and well-read individual. However there are other genres that deserve honorable mention as well. Gothic literature was a direct challenge to the norm both socially and religiously. Likewise, the fantasy does similarly for the modern day by pressing the bounds of the imagination and abilities. Here, I have listed examples of each literary genre that I have enjoyed and now hold dear. These are usually the books I recommend to friends or anyone else willing to listen.

The literary genres:

Literary Canon

Considered the most influential and prominent texts.

Gothic

Challenging the norm and pressing the boundaries of a religiously driven society.

Fantasy

Magic and other worldy places and people.

Explore more!

The genres available are endless: autobiographies, romance, beatnik, harlem renaissance, etc.
